title: Ergo Node Sync
description: Checks if the specified Ergo Node is synced by comparing the scanned headers vs full blocks, the last scanned block time, and the connected peers.

title: WID Token
description: Checks for the existence of the WID token in the watcher address.

title: Available ERG Balance
description: Checks if the 9iDUGh address has a sufficient ERG balance. The current balance is 6.709570449.

title: Ergo Node Scanner Sync
description: Checks if the scanner is in sync with the network. The last block saved by the Ergo Node scanner is 1552760.

title: Cardano Ogmios Scanner Sync
description: Checks if the scanner is in sync with the network. The last block saved by the Cardano Ogmios scanner is 12030778.

title: Available Reporting Permits
description: Checks if the watcher has sufficient permits for reporting. Currently has 4 available report permit.
